data.title: B Site Knife + Flash Exec
data.description: Suppress left side of B Site with a FLASH/DRIVE and ZERO/POINT combo to take control of a push.

data.title: Early Default A Flash Control
data.description: Blind defenders watching A Default with this FLASH/DRIVE lineup.

data.title: A Lobby to A Shop ZERO/POINT
data.description: A good ZERO/POINT to suppress enemies pushing into A Shop and get info if enemies are close and if not, allowing you to get the orb.

data.title: B Main to B Site ZERO/POINT + FRAG/MENT
data.description: A good combo of ZERO/POINT and FRAG/MENT to suppress and push enemies out of the back of B Site.

data.title: Close Left B Back ZERO/POINT From B Main
data.description: This ZERO/POINT is useful for suppressing / checking the close left corner in Back B Site that you see as you push out of B Main.
